biotools.summary: BAIT (Bioinformatic Analysis of Inherited Templates) is a software to create strand inheritance plots in data derived from the Strand-Seq sequencing protocol. The software is designed to be flexible with a range of species, and basic template folders can called to read in species-specific data.

bioschemas.name: BAIT
